text:
RELIGION

Sri Pundarikasha Perumal Temple, Thiruvellarai : Ratha utsavam, Perumal Thayar purappadu from Kannadi arai, 4.45 a.m.; reaching Anantharayar Mandapam, 5 a.m.; purappadu, 7 p.m.; reaching Thayar Sannidhi, 8 p.m.; thirumanjanam, 9 p.m.; reaching kannadi arai, 10.30 p.m.

Sri Vishnu Sahasranama Parayana Sabha : Sahasranama parayanam, Sri Venugopalan Sannidhi, Srirangam Sri Ranganathaswamy Temple, 6 p.m.; 24, East Chithra Street, Srirangam, 7 p.m.

Sri Rama Nama Sath Sangam : Sri Rama Nama parayanam, Sri Murugan Temple, Sathanur Main Road, 6 p.m.

Govindammal Tamil Mandram : U.Thandapani speaks on Kandapuranam, Pappammal Anna Chathram, Keezha Chinthamani, 6.30 p.m.

GENERAL

M.A.M.B School, Siruganur : Lecture on Neuro linguistic programming by G.Asok, associate professor, M.A.M.College of Engineering and Technology, 11 a.m.

Tiruchi District Kiddees Sports Development Association and VEPSA of St.John’s Vestry Anglo Indian Higher Secondary School: Valediction of sports fest and inter-school sports meet, P.Francis Sagayaraj, international athlete, chief guest, Anna Stadium, 4 p.m.
title: tiruchi today
